The CHS cheer team recently visited Orlando, Florida to participate in the Citrus Bowl. Teams invited to perform in the pre-game performance are trophy winners from Universal Cheerleaders Association (UCA) Cheer Camps.

Squad members had a week of rehearsals dedicated to preparing them for their pre-game performance in front of 60,000 fans at Camping World Stadium in Orlando, Florida. They stayed on Walt Disney World property and were also given the opportunity to visit the theme parks while there! Members participating were Skylar Anderson, Lexi Dawson, Caroline Gibbel, Mia Verticchio, Grace Wilton, Ryleigh Hunt and Emma Lyons.
